title: Onboarding - Success(Happy Path)
custom_preconds:
Android: [BPA-7052](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7052 ) / [BPA-7105](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7105)
iOS: [BP-10293](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10293 ) / [BP-10337](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10337)


GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed ANDROID 12.13.0 or later, iOS 13.0.0 or later)
custom_steps: GIVEN User display with Context Card for GoAhead-Entry(FFI) Registration on Home Tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User is on the Home Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I am displayed a Home GoAheadEntry context card (A black arrow represents CTA for link)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on Home GoAheadEntry context card's or A black arrow represents CTA for link
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Go Ahead Entry SDK should launch without any errors

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user lands on GO-AHEAD ENTRY flow using NEC SDK
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User display with Get Started screen with title of GO-AHEAD ENTRY

AND a middle section will be show that allows swiping to additional pages w/ further instructions

AND the initial page text shows: 
Title: Sign up for MLB's Go-Ahead Entry

Description: Register for MLB Go-Ahead Entry, the ultimate hands-free experience available for free to ticketed fans (18 and older) entering certain ballparks.
AND a button shown w/ text 'Get Started' [button is disabled initially]

AND a checkbox is shown w/ text 'By tapping "Get Started" I agree to MLB's Terms of Use and Privacy Policy' [checkbox is unchecked initially]

*Terms of Use is a link directing user to external browser with Terms
*Privacy Policy is a link directing user to external browser with Policy
AND a checkbox is shown w/ text 'I attest that I am eighteen (18) years of age or older.' [checkbox is unchecked initially]

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scroll left to right (2nd screen)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with an instruction for the complete the flow 

Title: 
First we'll capture an image of your face.

Description:
This image will be used by a service provider solely to create an alphanumeric MLB Go-Ahead ID for you and then immediately discarded. 

AND 'Learn more' CTA underlined 
AND Get Started button remains disabled
AND Terms and Services checkbox is displayed without check
AND Age confirmation checkbox is displayed without check


*Learn more is a link directing user to external browser with more info
AND user display with Cancel or X button on Top left to dismiss the GoAhead registration

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scroll left to right (3rd screen)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user continue with display an instruction for the complete flow 

Title: 
At the ballpark, head to a designated Go-Ahead Entry gate

Description:
Your tickets will already be tied to your Go-Ahead ID. All ticketed individuals in your group will be captured by the Go-Ahead cameras.


AND 'Learn more' CTA underlined 
AND Get Started button remains disabled
AND Terms and Services checkbox is displayed without check
AND Age confirmation checkbox is displayed without check


*Learn more is a link directing user to external browser with more info

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User acknowledges Terms and Privacy
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be able to checkmark MLB ID Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

(Checkbox filled up with black color)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User acknowledges Age
custom_steps_separated.expected:
AND User should be able to checkmark the age stipulation 
I attest that I am eighteen (18) years of age or older.
THEN Get Started button should be enabled with black color in white text

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps 'Get Started' within the Go-Ahead Entry page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[SKIP VALIDATION IF CAMERA ACCESS WAS PREV ALLOWED - PROCEED TO EXPECTATION STEP 17]

THEN user should display with Camera Prompt 

Android/iOS: 
Standard Existing Camera Promot modal OR 
"Ballpark" Would Like to Access the Camera 
Ballpark uses the camera to capture photos and videos. 

AND 'Don't Allow' and 'Okay' CTAs shown

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN prompt for Camera permission is denied
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user taken back to onboarding flow

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN prompt for Camera permission is allowed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should be able to proceed with NEC for enrollment to Go Ahead Entry

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tap Okay (Permission allowed)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should be granted with an interface provides a clear indication of the action that requires approval to capture confirmation 


GO-AHEAD ENTRY shows in Home Plate with MLB logo

Description:
We’ll take a quick capture to generate your MLB Go-Ahead ID

AND 'Continue' CTA shown

**ANDROID ONLY**

AND User display with Warming Up for Go-Ahead Entry with baseball in center

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tap on Continue
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be directed to capture their facial image 

Text display: 
Keep your face in the frame ....

[iOS verbiage may differ - i.e. No Faces were detected inside the frame.]

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tap on Cancel(iOS) or  X(android)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[Android] THEN user should directs to Home 
[iOS] THEN user should directs to previous page 

[The current behavior on iOS makes more sense for Apple’s navigation architecture]

AND user should display with Cancel button on top left (or Back arrow)
AND recording indicator (typically on top right)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user successfully captured their facial image for Go-Ahead ID 
AND NEC acceptance met
custom_steps_separated.expected:
AND Home plate icon should show in green color with MLB standard logo in it

AND user display with loading indicator displayed when image validation is in-progress 

AND lottie animation within home plate shows on screen while generating Go-Ahead ID 

Text display: 
Generating Go-Ahead ID...

THEN user should display with confirmation screen for successful enrollment in GoAhead

Green (dotted) check icon mark
Text: 
You're all set!
Thanks for registering! When you arrive at the ballpark enter at the First Base Gate in the designated Go-Ahead Entry gate

AND 'Learn more about GO-Ahead Entry' should display in green color with an underline shown

AND 'Done' CTA shown

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'Learn more about GO-Ahead Entry'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is directed to an external webview* opened to the URL that is configured in Remote Config (go_ahead_learn_more_url)

*external webview in default browswer

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on Done within Go-Ahead confirmation screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user taken to Home page of Ballpark App 
AND user display with context card that they have successfully enrolled to Go-Ahead Entry ((A black arrow represents CTA for Learn More link)

title: Camera Brightness Enhancement [iOS]
custom_preconds:
iOS:[BP-10370](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10370 )


GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (iOS 12.3.1 or later)
AND User has verified their account
custom_steps: GIVEN User display with Context Card for GoAhead-Entry(FFI) Registration on Home Tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user has set device brightness - low
WHEN User is on the Home Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I am displayed a Home GoAheadEntry context card (Register CTA)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on Home GoAheadEntry context card's Register CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User display with Get Started screen with title of GO-AHEAD ENTRY

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User acknowledges Terms and Privacy
AND User acknowledges Age
AND user taps 'Get Started' within the Go-Ahead Entry page
AND user has granted camera permissions
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should be granted with an interface provides a clear indication of the action that requires approval to capture confirmation 


GO-AHEAD ENTRY shows in Home Plate with MLB logo

Description:
We’ll take a quick capture to generate your MLB Go-Ahead ID

AND 'Continue' CTA shown

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tap on Continue
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be directed to capture their facial image 

Text display: 
Keep your face in the frame ....

[iOS verbiage may differ - i.e. Your face was not detected inside the frame.]

AND the device brightness should be set to high during image capture

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tap on Cancel(iOS)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should directs to previous page 
AND the device brightness should revert back to prev low setting

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user re-enters the image capture (via Get Started and Continue buttons) 
AND successfully captured their facial image for Go-Ahead ID
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the device brightness should be set to high during image capture

AND Home plate icon should show in green color with MLB standard logo in it
AND user display with loading indicator displayed when image validation is in-progress 
AND lottie animation within home plate shows on screen while generating Go-Ahead ID 

Text display: 
Generating Go-Ahead ID...

THEN the device brightness should revert back to prev low setting

AND user should display with confirmation screen for successful enrollment in GoAhead

Green (dotted) check icon mark
Text: 
You're all set!
Thanks for registering! When you arrive at the ballpark enter at the First Base Gate in the designated Go-Ahead Entry lane

AND 'Learn more about GO-Ahead Entry' should display in green color with an underline shown

AND 'Done' CTA shown

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on Done within Go-Ahead confirmation screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user taken to Home page of Ballpark App 
AND user display with context card that they have successfully enrolled to Go-Ahead Entry (Learn More CTA)

title: Age Gating for Onboarding - DOB Over 18
custom_preconds:
Android: https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7338
iOS: https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10544

GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed ANDROID 12.13.0 or later, iOS 13.0.0 or later)
AND User has verified their account
AND User with an age above 18
custom_steps:
GIVEN User display with Context Card for GoAhead-Entry(FFI) Registration on Home Tab
AND user is over the age of 18
AND user is on the first step of the onboarding flow

[Most of the steps of onboarding flow may covered in earlier cases] - This test is just validation of new requirement for the user is the age of 18

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User select Get Started button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a call will be made to the profile service to confirm DOB
THEN they will reach the next step of the onboarding flow (camera capture)

title: Age Gating - No DOB detected
custom_preconds:
Android: https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7363
iOS: https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10575
(Context: Context: We don’t know the fan’s DOB as they signed up for an MLB account before DOB was required for registration.)

GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed ANDROID 12.13.0 or later, iOS 13.0.0 or later)
AND User has verified their account
AND User with DOB unknown or not detected
custom_steps:
GIVEN User display with Context Card for GoAhead-Entry(FFI) Registration on Home Tab
GIVEN a fan has an unknown DOB 
AND User DOB is unknown or not detected 
AND they are on the first step of the onboarding flow

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user select Get Started button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a call will be made to the profile service to confirm DOB

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN profile service confirms no DOB found
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN they will reach a modal notifying them that DOB is required to confirm eligibility

AND they have the option to enter DOB or cancel (exit flow)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the select to cancel (exit flow)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the modal will close and they will be on the initial page of the onboarding flow

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a fan is under the age of 18

WHEN they select to enter DOB
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN they will reach a modal with todays date, month and year which is 18 year of age

AND they have the option to select and confirm their DOB or exit the modal to close the modal

Android: 
THEN they will reach a modal with todays date, month and year which is 18 year of age

User able to select or update birthday using date picker 

Cancel OK CTA

ANDROID: Android user have to choose a DAY after choosing a different year. The Android Date Picker doesn’t automatically keep the same day as previously chosen…as soon as you pick a new year it clears the day. A bit non-intuitive but that’s the way it works for Android. 

iOS: iOS user shown Month, Day and Year in-line within the prompt

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a fan has an unknown DOB
WHEN a fan selects a DOB calculated under the age of 18
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN an under age notification is displayed

AND the fan is unable to proceed to image capture

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a fan enters a DOB calculated under the age of 18

AND they have triggered the under age notification modal
WHEN they select the option to exit/close the modal
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they are navigated to the home page

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a fan has an unknown DOB
WHEN a fan enters a DOB calculated over the age of 18
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they will reach the next step of the onboarding flow (camera capture)

title: Age Gating - DOB Under 18
custom_preconds:
Android: https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7362
iOS: https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10574
[Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/SzhNPC0PGqQzg9cHioqLt6/Go-Ahead-Entry?type=design&node-id=5622-24591&mode=design&t=n0Vjw6JT3GI90Sy0-0) 
GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed ANDROID 12.13.0 or later, iOS 13.0.0 or later)
AND User has verified their account
AND User with an age under 18
custom_steps:
GIVEN User display with Context Card for GoAhead-Entry(FFI) Registration on Home Ta
AND user is under the age of 18
AND they are on the first step of the onboarding flow

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user select Get Started button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a call will be made to the profile service to confirm DOB 

i.e.https://profile-qa.mlb.com (QA) 
https://profile.mlb.com (PROD)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Profile service confirm their DOB
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user will reach a modal notifying them that DOB is required to confirm eligibility 
AND user should have the option to enter DOB or Cancel (Exit Flow) 

Modal: 
Date of Birth Required 

Enter your date of birth to confirm eligibility. 

CTAs:
*Android: Cancel, OK 
*iOS: Exit, Enter DOB

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user select Cancel/Exit
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the modal will close and they will be on the initial page of the onboarding flow

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user select to enter DOB
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user will reach a modal with their DOB pre-populated 

AND they have the option to select and confirm their DOB or exit the modal to close the modal

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a fan enters a DOB calculated under the age of 18 or confirms DOB on file
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN an under age notification is displayed

Modal: 
Sorry, you are ineligible to participate in Go-Ahead Entry 
You can still access your tickets to be scanned at the gate when you arrive at the ballpark. 

Exit to Home CTA

custom_steps_separated.content:
[To be follow from Step 5](User triggered the under age notification modal)
WHEN they select the option to exit/close the modal (“Exit to Home")
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they are navigated to the home page

custom_steps_separated.content:
Use Case: DOB on file is incorrect, fan is actually over 18

GIVEN a fan has a DOB on file that is under the age of 18

WHEN they select a DOB calculated over the age of 18
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user reach the next step in the enrollment (face capture acceptance)

	
ANDROID: Android user have to choose a DAY after choosing a different year. The Android Date Picker doesn’t automatically keep the same day as previously chosen…as soon as you pick a new year it clears the day. A bit non-intuitive but that’s the way it works for Android.

iOS: iOS user is shown the Month, Day and Year in-line. Tapping 'Update' CTA will take the values that are highlighted/centered in the spin-wheel

title: In-Line Correction
custom_preconds:
Android: [BPA-7072](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7072)
iOS: [BP-10325](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10325)

GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed ANDROID 12.8.0 or later iOS 12.3.0 or later)
AND User has verified their account
AND User has tickets to an upcoming game to PHI*
custom_steps: GIVEN User display with Context Card for GoAheadEntry(FFI) Registration on Home Tab

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN user on facial capture screen within GoAhead-Entry enrollment
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user able to continue the facial capture for GoAhead-Entry registration

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User display an error for invalid image or image not recognized
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with in-line correction 

Error Text: 
Please re-center your face in the frame above...
AND user should display with home plate with Cancel or X icon on top left corner

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User provide valid image
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should be able to continue the GoAhead-Entry registration completion

title: NEC Connection Error *[requires proxy]
custom_preconds:
Android: [BPA-7072](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7072)
iOS: [BP-10325](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10325)

GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed ANDROID 12.8.0 or later iOS 12.3.0 or later)
AND User has verified their account
AND User has tickets to an upcoming game to PHI*
custom_steps: GIVEN User display with Context Card for GoAhead-Entry(FFI) Registration on Home Tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user on facial capture screen within GoAhead-Entry enrollment
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user able to continue the facial capture for GoAhead-Entry registration

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN NEC throws an error during the facial image validation*



*may be able to force Go Ahead Entry : NEC Error by connecting to Proxy and adding a breakpoint to https://us-central1-mlb-ballpark-app-831.cloudfunctions.net response  (subpaths included) .... and then EITHER letting it timeout awaiting the response OR aborting the response immediately
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with an error message 

Error text: 
There was an error uploading your Go-Ahead ID...

Retry CTA display at bottom
AND user should be display with Retry CTA to submit the image again for validation
AND user display with Cancel or X icon on top left to dismiss the FFI enrollment

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN successful enrollment completed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should be able to continue the GoAhead-Entry registration completion

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tap on Done upon completion the GoAhead-Entry registration
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user taken to Ballpark App

title: NEC Error [ANDROID]
custom_preconds:
Android: BPA-7072
BPA- 7140 (Update user feedback strings) 


GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed ANDROID 12.8.0 or later iOS 12.3.0 or later)
AND User has verified their account
AND User has tickets to an upcoming game to PHI*
custom_steps:
GIVEN User display with Context Card for GoAhead-Entry(FFI) Registration on Home Tab

AND user is on NEC facial capture screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user on facial capture screen within GoAhead-Entry enrollment
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user able to continue the facial capture for GoAhead-Entry registration

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN NEC throws an error during the facial image validation
AND User get an error upon face detection
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with an error 
No face detected

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN NEC throws an error during the facial image validation
AND User eye/eyes closed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with an error 
Ensure eyes are looking at camera

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN NEC throws an error during the facial image validation
AND user attempt to take screenshot with other person with them
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with an error 
Multiple faces detected

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN NEC throws an error during the facial image validation
AND User has poor quality of image
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with an error 
Poor quality image

[SKIP THIS IF DOES NOT QUALIFIES THE CONDITION]

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN NEC throws an error during the facial image validation
AND User attempt to facial capture with their face really close to camera
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with an error 
Move device further

[SKIP THIS IF DOES NOT QUALIFIES THE CONDITION]

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN NEC throws an error during the facial image validation
AND User face is too far from camera
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with an error 
Bring device closer

[SKIP THIS IF DOES NOT QUALIFIES THE CONDITION]

title: NEC Error [iOS]
custom_preconds:
[BP-10372](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10372 )

GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (iOS 12.3.1 or later)
AND User has verified their account
custom_steps:
GIVEN User display with Context Card for GoAhead-Entry(FFI) Registration on Home Tab

AND user is on NEC facial capture screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user on facial capture screen within GoAhead-Entry enrollment
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user able to continue the facial capture for GoAhead-Entry registration

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN NEC throws an error during the facial image validation
AND User get an error upon face detection
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with an error 
Your face was not detected inside the frame.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN NEC throws an error during the facial image validation
AND User eye/eyes closed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with an error 
Make sure you have both eyes open.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN NEC throws an error during the facial image validation
AND user attempt to take screenshot with other person with them
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with an error 
Only one face can be in the frame at a time.

[SKIP THIS IF DOES NOT QUALIFIES THE CONDITION)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN NEC throws an error during the facial image validation
AND User has poor quality of image
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with an error 
Quality is low. Try improving your lighting conditions.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN NEC throws an error during the facial image validation
AND User attempt to facial capture with accessories (sunglasses, hats, scarves, masks, etc…)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with an error 
Please remove any accessories during image capture.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN NEC throws an error during the facial image validation
AND User attempt to facial capture while smiling or making faces
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with an error 
Look at the camera with a natural face. Don't smile or make faces.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN NEC throws an error during the facial image validation
AND User attempt to facial capture without a good pose
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with an error 
Please keep your face forward and your phone at eye level.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN NEC throws an error during the facial image validation
AND User attempt to facial capture and allows for timeout to occur
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with an error 
Image capture timed out. Please try again.

[SKIP THIS IF DOES NOT QUALIFIES THE CONDITION)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN NEC throws an error during the facial image validation
AND User attempt to facial capture with their face really close to camera
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with an error
Slowly move your phone further away from your face.

[SKIP THIS IF DOES NOT QUALIFIES THE CONDITION)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN NEC throws an error during the facial image validation
AND User face is too far from camera
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with an error
Slowly move your phone closer to your face.

[SKIP THIS IF DOES NOT QUALIFIES THE CONDITION)

title: Profile: MLB Go-Ahead ID menu option
custom_preconds:
Android: [BPA-7375](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7375)
iOS: [BP-10587](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10587)

GIVEN user on My Profile page (Android 12.8.0 or Later / iOS 12.3.0 or later)
GIVEN user on Profile Page (android 14.1.o or iOS 14.0 later)
AND user has already completed the successful enrollment in Go-Ahead Entry program
custom_steps: GIVEN User on My Profile page

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User on Profile page

AND user has already completed the successful enrollment in Go-Ahead Entry program
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be display in menu option as  "MLB GO-Ahead ID" on Profile page

* Favorite Teams
* App Notifications
* MLB Go-Ahead ID(Only shown when user enrolled for GAE)
* MLB Account Emails
* Ticket Accounts
* About Ballpark
* Close MLB Account
* Customer Support
* Do Not Share or Sell My Data (Does not override Apple's Do Not Track Settings)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User on Profile page
AND user haven't completed the successful enrollment in Go-Ahead Entry program
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should not display in menu option "MLB GO-Ahead ID" Profile page

* Favorite Teams
* App Notifications
* MLB Go-Ahead ID(Only shown when user enrolled for GAE)
* MLB Account Emails
* Ticket Accounts
* About Ballpark
* Close MLB Account
* Customer Support
* Do Not Share or Sell My Data (Does not override Apple's Do Not Track Settings)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on the "MLB Go-Ahead ID"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN selection of "MLB Go-Ahead ID" leads user to new view

AND New view should displays user enrollment status 

MLB Go-Ahead ID - Header/Title

'<' on top left corner in same line as MLB Go-Ahead ID (Android)
OR  
* '<' on top left corner in same line as MLB Go-Ahead ID (iOS)

Text Display: 
The Go-Ahead Entry experience allows you to enter the stadium hands-free and is available at select ballparks. Tap here for more information and a list of participating ballparks.

MLB Go-Ahead ID - ENROLLED display in dark blue pill

'Delete MLB Go-Ahead ID' display in bold black text in pill

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps 'Tap here' within the MLB Go-Ahead ID profile page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to an external browser opened to an appropriate page* with more information on Go Ahead Entry

*the webpage is configured as 'go_ahead_mlb_ballparks_url' in remote config

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on back navigation
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN selection of back navigation brings user to Profile page

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User taps on the "MLB Go-Ahead ID"
AND user taps on "Delete MLB Go-Ahead ID"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should display with Deletion prompt modal 

Body/Text: 

Delete MLB GO-Ahead ID 

Deleting your MLB Go-Ahead ID will remove your ID and require re-enrollment in the program. 

Delete Go-ahead ID - CTA
Cancel - CTA 

Note:Design may be vary Android vs iOS for this prompt Modal.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user select "Delete"/"Delete Go-Ahead ID" on the Deletion prompt modal
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is removed from Go-Ahead entry program
AND the user is returned to Profile page w/ MLB Go-Ahead ID entry removed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user successfully Unenrolled from MLB Go-Ahead ID
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should not display with MLB Go-Ahead Entry/ID menu option on Profile page

title: Identity: Passing Updated DOB
custom_preconds:
Android: [BPA-7387](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7387 )
iOS: [BP-10601](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10601 )

GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed ANDROID(TBD) or later, iOS 13.0.1 or later)
AND User has verified their account

NOTE: iOS does NOT pass the updated DOB to Identity in QA
custom_steps:
WHEN User has entered GAE onboarding flow 
AND user is either under the age of 18 OR has No DOB saved in MLB acct*
AND they are on the first step of the onboarding flow 


(this can be verified by confirming DOB initially saved to https://www.mlb.com/account/general )

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user select Get Started button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a call will be made to the profile/identity service to confirm DOB

AND user will reach a modal notifying them that DOB is required to confirm eligibility 
AND user should have the option to enter DOB or Cancel (Exit Flow) 

Modal: 
Date of Birth Required 

Enter your date of birth to confirm eligibility. 

CTAs:
*Android: Cancel, OK 
*iOS: Exit, Enter DOB

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user select to enter DOB
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user will reach a modal with their DOB pre-populated 

AND they have the option to select and confirm their DOB or exit the modal to close the modal

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN they select a DOB calculated over the age of 18
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user reach the next step in the enrollment (face capture acceptance)

AND Ballpark app passes updated DOB string to Identity team 

(this can be verified by confirming updated DOB saved to https://www.mlb.com/account/general )

title: iOS
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has downloaded the Ballpark app (installed ANDROID 12.8.0 or later, iOS 12.3.0 or later)
custom_steps:
GIVEN User deeplink(ballpark://go-ahead) or QR Code scan to register 

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13771511)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN App not installed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN User taken to the App store to Download the app 
AND User should be able to log in with their verified account 
AND open the registration experience for GAE

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN App installed
AND App backgrounded/not opened
AND User not logged in
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN User taken to the Log in page 
AND User should be able to log in with their verified account 
AND open the registration experience for GAE

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN App installed
AND App backgrounded/not opened
AND User is logged in
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN open the registration experience for GAE

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user receive deeplink via Push (this can be validated by sharing ballpark://go-ahead via Slack/Text message or other options)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be able to click on the link shared via push
AND open the registration experience for GAE

custom_steps:

title: Display "GO-AHEAD ENTRY" badge
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed ANDROID 14.6.0 or later, iOS 14.1.8 or later)
AND User is enrolled to GAE (For any GAE enabled club) 
AND user has upcoming game tickets on Home
custom_steps:
WHEN user display with NTE for GAE enrolled club on Home 
AND user is enrolled into GAE
custom_expected:
THEN user display with green “GO-AHEAD ENTRY" badge with MLB Logo on NTE
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14877400)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14877401)

title: Do not Display "GO-AHEAD ENTRY" badge
custom_steps: Given the user is logged in to the Ballpark App

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user navigates to the home tab
AND NTE on Home Tab is a ticket for a venue that does not support Go-Ahead Entry
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the "GO-AHEAD ENTRY" badge is not displayed

title: Badge updates after GAE Removal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed ANDROID 14.6.0 or later, iOS 14.1.8 or later)
AND User is not enrolled to GAE (For any GAE enabled club) or Deleted Go-Ahead ID
AND user has upcoming game tickets
custom_steps:
WHEN user display with NTE for GAE enrolled club on Home
AND user is not enrolled into GAE
custom_expected: THEN user display does not display with green “GO-AHEAD ENTRY" badge after removal of GAE or not enrolled to GAE
